author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
Revision of HLT for 80X/2016.
Removal of 2015 frozen HLT menus.
Inclusion of updated development menus (GRun, HIon, PRef, PIon) aiming toward 2016.
Adjustment of autoHLT.py and autoCondHLT.py files.
RelVals beware: 50ns HLT (removed) is redirected to using the Fake menu.
title: Revision of HLT for 80X/2016
